files_created.description: Intelligence page template with Coming Soon placeholder

files_modified.description: Added BUILD-017 verification steps and test cases

details.criterion: Placeholder page with Coming Soon messaging
details.verification: Created intelligence.html with 'Coming Soon' heading and feature list
Used consistent cyberpunk styling from dashboard.html (gradient background, accent colors, fonts)

details.criterion: No functional implementation required for MVP
details.verification: Page is placeholder only with no backend integration or data fetching

implementation_summary.approach: Created FastAPI route handler and corresponding Jinja2 HTML template
template_features: Cyberpunk-themed dark layout matching existing dashboard
Coming Soon placeholder with feature list
Responsive design for mobile, tablet, and desktop
Navigation links back to dashboard and admin panel
Consistent typography and color scheme (#0a0e27 background, #00ff9d accent)
implementation_summary.route_handler: Simple template response handler at GET /intelligence

technical_decisions: Used Jinja2 templates consistent with existing dashboard.html
Applied same CSS styling approach (inline styles) for consistency
Featured planned intelligence page components: Critical Advisories, Recent Exploits, Mitigation Coverage, Vendor Advisory Feed, Threat Severity Dashboard, Zero-Day Tracking
Maintained cyberpunk aesthetic from existing application design

manual_tests: Page title and content are correct
Responsive design verified at different viewports

assumptions: FastAPI and Jinja2 are already configured in the application
Application follows existing pattern of simple HTML template responses
future_work: Implement actual threat intelligence data integration
Add real-time advisory feed from security databases
Integrate with CISA, NVD, and vendor advisory sources
Implement exploit tracking and zero-day monitoring
Add mitigation coverage statistics from product inventory
Create interactive charts and dashboards for threat metrics
notes: This is a placeholder implementation for MVP. The page displays planned features and will serve as a stub until full threat intelligence functionality is developed. The route is now available for integration testing and navigation updates.
